SEARCH
Package org.apache.lucene.search.matchhighlight

Class MatchHighlighter

java.lang.Object
org.apache.lucene.search.matchhighlight.MatchHighlighter
public class MatchHighlighter extends Object
An example highlighter that combines several lower-level utility classes in this package into a fully featured, ready-to-use component.

Note: if you need to customize or tweak the details of highlighting, it is better to assemble your own highlighter using those low-level building blocks, rather than extend or modify this one.

    • appendFieldHighlighter

      public MatchHighlighter appendFieldHighlighter(MatchHighlighter.FieldValueHighlighter highlighter)
      Append a new highlighter to field highlighters chain. The order of field highlighters is important (first-matching wins).
